about_the_game:
New World Order: Anarchy Collapsed

The world is divided. The enemy is coming. Only one leader will rise.

In a world on the brink of destruction, power is everything. NWO: Anarchy Collapsed is a grand strategy game fused with idle mechanics, where every second counts. Your income grows continuously, and with smart upgrades, your power expands. Whether by force or influence, you must seize control, unite nations, and prepare for the greatest battle in human history before it’s too late.

Key Features:

🌍 Global Conquest

The mission is clear—take over and unite all 195 countries before the enemy arrives. Expand your reach, capture key territories, and use war or diplomacy to dominate the world.

🏛️ War or Influence

Choose your path:

  • Conquer with military force—train troops, deploy tanks and drones, build defenses, and launch strategic invasions.

  • Control with influence—spread culture, religion, and economic power to silently take over nations without a single shot fired.

💰 Income Per Second – Build & Expand

Money fuels power. Your income grows every second—upgrade factories, businesses, and trade routes to increase your wealth and expand your reach. The more countries you control, the more resources you command.

🔥 Prepare for War

An unknown enemy is coming, and only a united world stands a chance. Will you be the one to lead humanity to victory—or will Earth fall?

🏆 Ultimate Victory

In NWO: Anarchy Collapsed, there is no second place. Unite the world, command its resources, and decide the fate of civilization.

💥 A Strategy Game Like No Other!
A perfect blend of deep geopolitical strategy and income-based mechanics, where expansion and efficiency lead to world domination.

▶ Wishlist Now and get ready to claim your empire! 🚀

content_descriptors.notes: New World Order - Anarchy Collapsed contains instances of fantasy violence and occasional mature language. Players will encounter scenes of conflict, including battles and skirmishes between factions, along with some language that may not be suitable for younger audiences. The game does not contain sexual content or explicit depictions of gore. This content is integral to the game’s post-apocalyptic, war-driven setting and enhances the overall immersion and intensity.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 Home 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-3470 | AMD® FX™ 9370 (AVX support required)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 660 (2GB) | AMD® Radeon™ R7 370 (2GB) or Intel® Iris® Xe Graphics or AMD® Radeon™ Vega 8
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64 Bit or Windows® 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6600K | AMD® Ryzen™ 5 2600X (AVX support required)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 1660 (6GB) | AMD® Radeon™ RX 5600 XT (6GB) | Intel® Arc™ A580 (8GB)
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
